join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add test (_QUOTE_)
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
send hortbot #foobar [HB] No quotes.


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!quote add "quote 1"
send hortbot #foobar [HB] "quote 1" added as quote #1.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
send hortbot #foobar [HB] "quote 1"


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!quote add "quote 2"
send hortbot #foobar [HB] "quote 2" added as quote #2.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
send_match hortbot #foobar \[HB\] "quote (1|2)"
